name: navidrome
description: Navidrome is a modern, self-hosted music streaming server and API compatible with Subsonic. It provides fast search, mobile clients, playlists, and a clean responsive interface for personal music libraries.

features.title: REST API
features.description: Works with dozens of mobile and desktop music clients across all platforms

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Efficiently indexes large music collections with metadata extraction and cover art

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Separate libraries and preferences for different users with access controls

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Track listening history and sync play counts to Last.fm for music discovery

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Modern browser-based interface with queue management and playback controls

features.title: Album Art Management
features.description: Automatic cover art fetching with manual override options
